Summaries.eng: Meet hell's most adorable messenger. Chimimo might be an average demon, but he and his horde of minions have big dreams of unleashing hell on earth! Too bad a portal to the human realm drops him into the middle of the Onigami household, where the family’s three unflappable sisters rule the roost with iron fists. Now Chimimo is stuck as their freeloading roommate, and his ambitions of unleashing the apocalypse will have to wait until he can summon the willpower to get off the couch!
Summaries.jpn: 「心温まるコメディ」アニメは、地獄の使者であり、形を変える邪悪な悪魔であるチミモを中心にしています。 Chimimoは、人間の世界を地獄に変えることを使命とする12人の邪悪な悪魔の1人です。 「地獄さん」と一緒に12人の悪魔は人間の世界に行きますが、地獄さんとチミモはムツミ、ハヅキ、メイという3人の姉妹の家族のフリーローダーになります。

Titles.eng: A Hellish Beginning / The Envoy From Hell
Titles.jpn: 地獄のはじまり／地獄からの使者

Summaries.eng: The Onigami sisters find a strange creature in their home and decide to keep it. But then more of them show up.

Titles.eng: Operation: Turn the Human Realm Into Hell / When You Wanna Work, But It's Hell
Titles.jpn: 人間界地獄化計画／働きたくて、地獄

Summaries.eng: Mr. Hell receives a phone call that lights a fire under his lazy butt, but he’s too distracted by his burning love of food to buckle down!

Titles.eng: The Pits of Hell / A Hellish Gift Murder Mystery
Titles.jpn: 地獄の穴／地獄のお土産殺人事件

Summaries.eng: A looming deadline lights a fire under Mr. Hell’s butt, but where’s a human despicable enough to toss into a hell-pit when you need one? His new roommates may have a lead!

Titles.eng: The Hellacious Battle of Siblings / Aw Hell, an Artistic Explosion!
Titles.jpn: 地獄の姉妹バトル／芸術が爆発して地獄だ！

Summaries.eng: Mr. Hell must encourage fights between humans in order to create hell on earth. Lucky for him, his new roommates make the job pretty easy... but are the consequences worth it?

Titles.eng: A Hellish Scheme / Dead the Hellspawn
Titles.jpn: 地獄のたくらみ／デッド THE 地獄

Summaries.eng: Something strange is afoot, and Mr. Hell is determined to find out what. But the chimimoryo aren’t making it easy...

Titles.jpn: 地獄マター／しあわせ地獄

Summaries.eng: Mr. Hell must collect the hellish experiences of humans to complete the Hell Matter and rain fire and brimstone on humanity!

Titles.eng: May's Birthstone Is Emerald as All Hell / An Enlightened Day in Hell
Titles.jpn: 5月の誕生石はエメラルドな地獄／地獄のタッカーーーン

Summaries.eng: Mei’s dreams of influencer stardom become reality when a series of not-so-truthful social media posts take on a life of their own.

Titles.jpn: ネコちゃん地獄／地獄のちみもみん

Summaries.eng: The Chimimo make a friend they can’t live without, but is there room for a new recruit in the ranks? Later, Hazuki thinks of an industrious new use for the Chimimo.

Titles.eng: Hell-Bent on a Stack of Money / Yikes! The Senpai From Hell Arrives
Titles.jpn: 10万円争奪地獄／襲来！地獄先輩

Summaries.eng: An unexpected windfall pits the members of the Onigami house against each other as they vie for popularity among the Chimimo.

Titles.eng: Diet Hell / The Hell of Being "Old Enough"
Titles.jpn: ダイエット地獄／はじめてのおつかい地獄

Summaries.eng: The Chimimo star in their own edition of “Old Enough” when they run their very first errand for the Onigami household!

Titles.eng: I Wonder Where You'll Be When I Eventually Look Back on This Hell / How to Deal With Being Bored as Hell
Titles.jpn: この地獄をいつかボクが思い出す時、キミはどこにいるのだろうか。／ヒマすぎ地獄の過ごし方

Summaries.eng: An unexpected guest drops by with a request that complicates Mei’s Ponskagram scheme.

Titles.eng: Creating Hell! And Then Into the Hellfire... / A Hellish Ending
Titles.jpn: 地獄創造！そ＄地獄へ・・・／地獄のおわり

Summaries.eng: Mr. Hell’s senpai has arrived to deliver a hellish ultimatum. Under her watchful eye, Mr. Hell must perform an insidious ritual and finally create hell on earth!
